summary: a Retexture of the Stalhrim Armor
descriptionHtml:
[line]

[center][color=Gold][size=4]BloodStained Stalhrim Armor[/size][/color][/center] 

[color=Gold][size=3]Version             :[/size][/color]1.0

[color=Gold][size=3]Date                :[/size][/color]08/13/2012

[color=Gold][size=3]Category            :[/size][/color]Models and textures

[color=Gold][size=3]Author\'s Website    :[/size][/color]Forzane

[line] 

This mod requires the Dragonborn DLC to work. 

[line] 



[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Description[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]This is a Retexture of the Stalhrim Armor in Dragonborn[/center] 

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Detail[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]In Detail, this is a Retexture of all the Stalhrim Armor in Dragon including Heavy and 
Light...Male and Female[/center] 

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]History[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]v1 ---Initial release of Armors[/center] 

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Manual installation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]extract the content of the 7z to ur Data folder[/center] 

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Nexus Mod Manager Installation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]just Download with Manager and install[/center] 

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Manual Uninstallation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]delete the Stalhrimheavy and the Stalhrimlight folders located inside textures\\dlc02
\\armor\\[/center] 

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Nexus Mod Manager Uninstallation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]just uninstall it[/center] 

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Tools Used:[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[list]

[*][url=http://www.adobe.com/africa/products/photoshop.html?kw=p&sdid=JTAJR&skwcid=TC|22636|
photoshop||S|b|26174987875]Photoshop[/url] 

[*][url=http://www.7-zip.org/download.html]7Zip[/url] 

[/list] 

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Future Plans[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]If There is enough desire i may retexture the weapons to match the armor[/center] 

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Gold]Legal and Licensing[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]ask me before using my Retexture[/center] 

[line]



[center][size=5][color=Gold]ReadMe generated with: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/
mods/22340]Pyr√≤s: GuideLines[/url][/color][/size][/center] 

[line]
author: Forzane
